metadata.metaValue:
'The subdivision scheme to be applied to the surface.
        Valid values are:

        - "catmullClark": The default, Catmull-Clark subdivision; preferred for quad-dominant meshes (generalizes B-splines)
        - "loop": Loop subdivision; preferred for purely triangular meshes
        - "bilinear": Subdivision reduces all faces to quads (topologically similar to "catmullClark")
        - "none": No subdivision, i.e. a simple polygonal mesh
